posts.title: Podcasts now in Razor SSG
posts.summary: Razor SSG now includes support for Podcasts

posts.title: ASP.NET Core JWT Identity Auth
posts.summary: Learn about integration and value added features of ASP.NET Core JWT Identity Auth

posts.title: Built-In Identity Auth Admin UI
posts.summary: Explore the new Identity Auth Admin UI for creating and managing Identity Auth users in .NET 8
posts.author: Lucy Bates

posts.title: System.Text.Json ServiceStack APIs
posts.summary: ServiceStack .NET 8+ APIs can now be configured to use high-performance async System.Text.Json serialization

posts.title: OpenAPI v3 and Swagger UI
posts.summary: A walkthrough of the new OpenAPI v3 support in ServiceStack 8.1
posts.author: Brandon Foley

posts.title: ServiceStack Endpoint Routing
posts.summary: ServiceStack .NET 8 is now more integrated then ever with support for ASP.NET Core Endpoint Routing and IOC
posts.author: Lucy Bates

podcasts.title: Podcasts now in Razor SSG
podcasts.summary: Razor SSG now includes support for Podcasts

podcasts.title: Scalable SQLite
podcasts.summary: Exploring different techniques in ServiceStack for building maximum value, high-performance Scalable SQLite Web Apps

podcasts.title: SQLite Request Logging
podcasts.summary: Checking out ServiceStack's new SQLite-backed Request Logs feature and enhanced log querying and filtering in the Admin UI

podcasts.title: Background Jobs
podcasts.summary: Taking a deep dive into Background Jobs, a new library for .NET 8 Apps for simplifying task scheduling and management

podcasts.title: ServiceStack v8.4 Release
podcasts.summary: The latest features and improvements in ServiceStack v8.4 covering Background Jobs, SQLite Request Logs, Scalable SQLite Apps and more!

podcasts.title: Commands Feature
podcasts.summary: Looking into how to utilize Commands to build more robust and observable systems

podcasts.title: Simple Auth Story for .NET 8 Microservices
podcasts.summary: Taking a look at the simple "user-free" Auth story made possible with API Keys and Admin UI that's ideal for .NET 8 Microservices

podcasts.title: Using API Keys to secure .NET 8 APIs
podcasts.summary: Exploring the new API Keys Identity Auth feature and how its Admin UI enables simple fine-grained access control in ServiceStack .NET 8 APIs

podcasts.title: ServiceStack v8.3 Release
podcasts.summary: The latest features and improvements in ServiceStack v8.3 covering Commands Feature, API Keys, Integrated Admin UIs and more!

podcasts.title: ASP.NET Core Output Caching
podcasts.summary: A look at how to use ASP.NET Core Output Caching and ServiceStack.Redis to cache the response of ServiceStack APIs in Redis

podcasts.title: ASP.NET Core Rate Limiter Middleware
podcasts.summary: A guide explaining how ASP.NET Core's Rate Limiter Middleware can be used to protect ServiceStack APIs and Apps from abuse

podcasts.title: New React SPA Template
podcasts.summary: A tour of the features in the new enhanced Vite TypeScript React SPA template for .NET 8

podcasts.title: New Vue SPA Template
podcasts.summary: Getting to know the advanced features and capabilities of the enhanced Vite TypeScript Vue SPA template for .NET 8

podcasts.title: ServiceStack v8.2 Release
podcasts.summary: All about ServiceStack v8.2 Release new Vue & React Vite SPA Tailwind Markdown powered Templates, integrated Identity Auth, new Kotlin Compose Multiplatform template and new Vite Press Plugin

podcasts.title: ServiceStack v8.1 Release
podcasts.summary: ServiceStack v8.1 is here with a host of new features including full integration with Identity Auth, ASP .NET IOC, Endpoint Routing, System.Text.Json APIs, enhanced Admin UIs with JWT support, and much more!
